knimeNode.name: MDS Pivot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs a Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) on a number of selected pivot elements while the remaining instances are embedded into the lower-dimensional space based on the given pivot (landmark) embedding.

fullDescription.intro:
The algorithm uses only a subset of the data (pivot elements) to compute an embedding into lower dimension space. The remaining instances are mapped respectively to the landmark elements. For details see:
Eigensolver Methods for Progressive Multidimensional Scaling of Large Data
fullDescription.option: Select lower dimensionality to emebbed data into.
Select number of pivot elements used as initial landmarks.
Select number of column to be embeded into lower dimension.
